T02D2577:43b-0: @43b // ngan song sbyong ba 'gro ba rigs drug gi cho ga bzhugs//
T02D2577:43b-3: ngan song sbyong ba 'gro ba rigs drug gi cho ga / ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
T02D2577:43b-4: tshe 'das las su bya ba ni //
T02D2577:43b-6: dri ma mandala steng du gzhag / lan chags gtor ma cha gcig bsham //
T02D2577:43b-7: dkyil 'khor cho ga kun zin nas //
T02D2577:43b-8: gtor ma cha gsum gtang bar bya //
T02D2577:43b-9: de nas tshe las 'das pa yang //
T02D2577:43b-10: 'gro ba rigs drug dag nas dgug //
T02D2577:43b-11: dri ma dag la bstim par bya //
T02D2577:43b-12: h'um ltos shig ltos shig rigs kyi bu //
T02D2577:43b-13: las kyi dbang gis tshe 'das te //
T02D2577:43b-15: las dang thugs rje'i dam tshig gis //
T02D2577:43b-16: ye shes lcags kyus drang zhing 'gug / aa nri su du pre dza aam ku sha dza:dza:/
T02D2577:44a-0: tshe las 'das pa'i shes pa de 'gro ba rigs drug gang na @44a * //
T02D2577:44a-1: gnas kyang lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas rab tu bkug la
T02D2577:44a-2: dri ma dang mtshan la bstims la dngos su gnas
T02D2577:44a-3: par bsam mo // de nas sdig sgrub thams cad dral te /
T02D2577:44a-4: h'um stong gsum mun gnag 'khyams pa la //
T02D2577:44a-5: 'jam dpal shes rab rnon po yis //
T02D2577:44a-6: log rtog rgyun gcod ral gri 'dis //
T02D2577:44a-7: ting 'dzin shugs ldan phyag rgyas dral //
T02D2577:44a-8: aom manydzu shr'i muktha ta ka tra tha phat ces pas sdig pa thams cad bcad par bsam mo //
T02D2577:44a-9: de nas las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad bkru ste /
T02D2577:44a-10: h'um gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste //
T02D2577:44a-11: 'jam dpal ye shes chu rgyun gyis //
T02D2577:44a-12: tshe 'das khyod la khrus byas pas //
T02D2577:44a-13: nyon mongs bag chags dag gyur cig /
T02D2577:44a-14: ces phreng sngags kyis khrus bya'o //
T02D2577:44a-15: de nas bar 'dir bcu gcig rnam par dag pas tshogs bsags par bya'o //
T02D2577:44a-16: de nas me tog dor ba ni //
T02D2577:44a-17: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02D2577:44a-18: 'jam dpal rdo rje yin par grags //
T02D2577:44a-19: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
T02D2577:44a-20: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / aom badzra par t'itstsha ho /
T02D2577:44a-21: zhes me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2577:44a-22: de nas mig dbye ba ni /
T02D2577:44a-23: 'jam dpal rdo rje deng khyod kyis //
T02D2577:44a-24: mig dbye bar ni brtson par mdzod //
T02D2577:44a-25: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D2577:44a-26: da lta nyid du phyed par shog //
T02D2577:44a-27: he badzra p'a shya h'um zhes dbye'o //
T02D2577:44a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2577:44a-29: de nas rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur te /
T02D2577:44a-30: h'um rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2577:44a-31: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis //
T02D2577:44a-32: zhe sdang rnam dag mi bskyod pa'i //
T02D2577:44a-33: bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2577:44a-34: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2577:44a-35: tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2577:44a-36: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis //
T02D2577:44a-37: nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ldan gyis //
T02D2577:44a-38: dbu rgyan cod pan dbang bskur ro //
T02D2577:44a-39: aom badzra mu ku ta ratna tr'am /
T02D2577:44a-40: 'du byed phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2577:44a-41: bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis //
T02D2577:44a-42: phrag dog don yod grub pa yi //
T02D2577:44a-43: rdo rje yi ni dbang bskur ro //
T02D2577:44a-44: aom badzra karmma po tsha na badzra badzra h'um /
T02D2577:44a-45: 'du shes phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2577:44a-46: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02D2577:44a-47: 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas kyi //
T02D2577:44a-48: shes rab dril bus dbang bskur ro //
T02D2577:44a-50: gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2577:44a-51: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis //
T02D2577:44a-52: gti mug rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
T02D2577:44a-53: dpal ldan ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02D2577:44b-0: @44b aom badzra aa bhi she ka h'um /
T02D2577:44b-1: de nas lan chags kyi gtor ma btang la lam bstan cing smon lam gdab pa ni /
T02D2577:44b-2: he rigs kyi bu rdo rje che ge mo khyod //
T02D2577:44b-3: skye ba gar skyes gar gnas kyang //
T02D2577:44b-4: cis kyang 'pho ba med pa yis //
T02D2577:44b-5: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga la //
T02D2577:44b-6: longs spyod pa yi skal ldan nas //
T02D2577:44b-7: rdo rje 'chang gral 'khod gyur cig / skye gnas gzhan gyis bar du ma chod par //
T02D2577:44b-8: gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ston pa yis //
T02D2577:44b-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa dang phrad nas //
T02D2577:44b-10: des bstan pa yi gsang sngags ma nor bar //
T02D2577:44b-11: rtogs nas yang dag par ni sangs rgyas te //
T02D2577:44b-12: sems can thams cad 'khor pa'i rgya mtsho las //
T02D2577:44b-13: sgrol ba'i ded dpon chen po byed gyur cig /
T02D2577:44b-14: ces brjod la lam bstan cing smon lam gdab par
T02D2577:44b-15: bya'o // tshe las 'das pa'i sgrib pa sbyong ba'i
T02D2577:44b-16: cho ga 'gro ba rigs drug nas 'don pa dang
T02D2577:44b-17: bya'o // / dkyil 'khor drug tu gzhug cing dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2577:44b-18: lam bstan cing smon lam gdab pa /
T02D2577:44b-19: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D2577:44b-20: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
